Class DODInstanceDAO

    • ch.cern.dod.db.dao.DODInstanceDAO

extends java.lang.Object
    DAO for DODInstance entity.
    Author:
    Daniel Gomez Blanco

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        private java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                   throws javax.naming.NamingException,
                                          java.sql.SQLException
        Obtains a new connection from the pool.
        Returns:
        a connection to the database.
        Throws:
        javax.naming.NamingException - if the context cannot be found.
        java.sql.SQLException - if the datasource cannot be created.

      • selectAll

        public java.util.List<DODInstance> selectAll(java.util.List<DODUpgrade> upgrades)
        Selects all the instances in the database. It takes the list of available upgrades in order to decide if an instance needs upgrading or not.
        Parameters:
        upgrades - list of available upgrades.
        Returns:
        List of all the instances in the database.

      • selectToDestroy

        public java.util.List<DODInstance> selectToDestroy()
        Selects all the instances to be destroyed. These are the instances with a status of 0.
        Returns:
        List of all the instances to be destroyed.

      • selectByUserNameAndEGroups

        public java.util.List<DODInstance> selectByUserNameAndEGroups(java.lang.String username,
                                                     java.lang.String egroups,
                                                     java.util.List<DODUpgrade> upgrades)
        Select the instances belonging to a username or to any of their e-groups. It takes the list of available upgrades in order to decide if an instance needs upgrading or not.
        Parameters:
        username - username to obtain instances.
        egroups - e-groups that the user belongs to.
        upgrades - upgrades available.
        Returns:
        List of instances belonging to a username or to any of their e-groups.

      • selectInstancesPerHost

        public java.util.List<DODInstance> selectInstancesPerHost(java.lang.String host,
                                                 java.util.List<DODUpgrade> upgrades)
        Selects the instances in the database for the specified host. It takes the list of available upgrades in order to decide if an instance needs upgrading or not.
        Parameters:
        host - name of the host.
        upgrades - upgrades available.
        Returns:
        List of the instances in the host.

      • selectByDbName

        public DODInstance selectByDbName(java.lang.String dbName,
                         java.util.List<DODUpgrade> upgrades)
        Select a specific instance by its DB name. It takes the list of available upgrades in order to decide if an instance needs upgrading or not.
        Parameters:
        dbName - DB name of the instance.
        upgrades - upgrades available.
        Returns:
        instance for the username and DB name specified.

      • insert

        public int insert(DODInstance instance)
        Inserts a new instance in the database. It also updates the slave attribute in the master in case this instance has a master.
        Parameters:
        instance - instance to be inserted.
        Returns:
        1 if the operation was successful, 0 otherwise.

      • delete

        public int delete(DODInstance instance)
        Deletes an instance from the database.
        Parameters:
        instance - instance to be deleted.
        Returns:
        1 if the operation was successful, 0 otherwise.

      • update

        public int update(DODInstance oldInstance,
         DODInstance newInstance,
         java.lang.String requester)
        Updates an instance with new values.
        Parameters:
        oldInstance - old values of the instance.
        newInstance - new values of the instance.
        requester - username requesting this, in order to log it.
        Returns:
        1 if the operation was successful, 0 otherwise.

      • swapMasterSlave

        public int swapMasterSlave(java.lang.String newMaster,
                  java.lang.String newSlave)
        Swaps master and slave in the database.
        Parameters:
        newMaster - new master.
        newSlave - new slave.
        Returns:
        number of updated instances if the operation was successful, 0 otherwise.

      • selectInstanceChanges

        public java.util.List<DODInstanceChange> selectInstanceChanges(DODInstance instance)
        Obtains the list of changes to attributes of an instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - DOD instance to get the changes from.
        Returns:
        list of changes for the specified instance.

      • rescue

        public int rescue(DODInstance instance)
        Rescues an instance and enables it back again. It changes the status from 0 to 1.
        Parameters:
        instance - instance to be deleted.
        Returns:
        1 if the operation was successful, 0 otherwise.

      • isInstanceOnFIM

        public boolean isInstanceOnFIM(DODInstance instance)
        Checks if an instance is on FIM.
        Parameters:
        instance - instance to check.
        Returns:
        true if the instance is on FIM, false otherwise.
